forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms during the morning followed by occasional showers this afternoon. High around 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 59F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Thunder possible. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Periods of rain early. Thunder possible. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 8C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High around 15C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 58F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High near 15C. SE winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 59F. SE winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 47F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with a few showers later in the day. High 57F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 49F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 61F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 9C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 48F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 18C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 64F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 66F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing later at night. Low near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 17C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two possible early with partly cloudy skies later at night. Low near 10C. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
